page.shortlink: Run a report that is embedded in a UX component using a custom filter for the report
page.topic: Run a report that is embedded in a UX component using a custom filter for the report
page.description: Create a highly customized 'Search Part' for a Report. Allows you to submit a UX component that contains 'search' fields to compute a filter expression and then run the report using the computed filter expression.

item.name: Embedded Report name
item.description: Specify the name of the embedded Report you want to display. Choices include.

item.name: Define search fields
item.description: Specify the controls on the Dialog that will be used to compute the Filter to apply to the embedded report.

item.name: Combine multiple search conditions with
item.description: If the user defines a search on more than one field, combine the search criteria with either an AND or OR keyword. Choices include *[ui:AND]*, *[ui:OR]*.
